ResearchProjectDef.Name: FckBrainWiring
ResearchProjectDef.description: If anyone knows how to hide research projects, hit me up.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Understanding the shape of a leg and combining that knowledge with basic woodworking, you can now craft peg legs and other basic prostheses at the crafting spot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced anatomy studies and metal testing will allow you to build simple prostheses. Unlocks the prosthetics table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tissue printer
ResearchProjectDef.description: As you gain higher medical and technical knowledge, creating a 3D printer to craft simple surrogate organs now becomes possible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better prostheses are now open for you. Unlocks new recipes at the prosthetics table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brain surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to craft basic basic brain implants and install them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: rib replacements
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small dispensers, you think about putting them in ribs. You can now craft and install rib implants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade regular bionics with advanced components to make them even better. Unlocks new recipes at the prosthetics table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionic spine
ResearchProjectDef.description: The anatomy of the human spine is ridiculously complicated. You should probably research a little bit before messing with it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionic spine
ResearchProjectDef.description: You want to cram even more complex tech into your spine? Just take some time to study the intricacies of the spinal column.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionic warfare
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using bionics just in a peaceful way to restore missing limbs seems like such a waste. Let's use them as weapons! Unlocks bionic melee weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionic warfare
ResearchProjectDef.description: You've tasted blood and now you want more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered artificial organs. Unlocks new recipes on the tissue printer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced brain surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft more advanced brain implants and perform surgery on the brain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: exoskeleton suits
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilise absolute cutting-edge motor technology and the knowledge of ergonomics to understand the concept of exoskeletons and replicate this with humans. Allows for the production and installation of exoskeleton suits.
